Mverani mau anga, Yehova, Zindikirani kulingirira kwanga.
Tamvetsani mau a kufuula kwanga,Mfumu yanga, ndi Mulungu wanga;pakuti kwa Inu ndimapemphera.
M'mawa, Yehova, mudzamva mau anga;m'mawa, ndidzakukonzerani pemphero langa, ndipo ndidzadikira.
Pakuti Inu sindinu Mulungu wakukondwera nacho choipamphulupulu siikhala ndi Inu.
Opusa sadzakhazikika pamaso panu,mudana nao onse akuchita zopanda pake.
Mudzaononga iwo akunena bodza;munthu wokhetsa mwazi ndi wachinyengo,Yehova anyansidwa naye.
Koma ine, mwa kuchuluka kwa chifundo chanundidzalowa m'nyumba yanu;ndidzagwada kuyang'ana Kachisi wanu woyera ndi kuopa Inu.
Yehova, munditsogolere m'chilungamo chanu,chifukwa cha akundizondawo;mulungamitse njira yanu pamaso panga.
Pakuti m'kamwa mwao mulibe mau okhazikika;m'kati mwao m'mosakaza;m'mero mwao ndi manda apululu;lilime lao asyasyalika nalo.
Muwayese otsutsika Mulungu;agwe nao uphungu wao.M'kuchuluka kwa zolakwa zao muwapirikitse;pakuti anapikisana ndi Inu.
Koma akondwere onse amene athawira kwa Inu,afuule mokondwera kosaleka, popeza muwafungatira;nasekere mwa Inu iwo akukonda dzina lanu.
Pakuti Inu, Yehova, mudzadalitsa wolungamayo;mudzamtchinjiriza nacho chivomerezo ngati chikopa.
